Title: TFS Work Item Association Check-in Policy
Description: This policy requires TFS source control check-ins to be associated with a single, in-progress task that is assigned to you.
HomeWiki:
This project is going to be moved to the TFS Plugins Suite

https://tfspluginsuite.codeplex.com/

This policy requires TFS source control check-ins to be associated with a single, in-progress task that is assigned to you.

"Do one commit per small-grained, consistent task." (Berczuk)

(See FAQs in documentation section.)
